#include "cstdio"
#include "iostream"
#define rep(i, n) for(int i=0; i<n; i++)
using namespace std;

#define MAX_TIRE 100010*26
#define MAX_CHILD 2
struct trie{
	trie *c[MAX_CHILD];
	int x;
}triemem[MAX_TIRE], *null = &triemem[0], *C = &triemem[1];
trie *newtrie(){
	C->c[0] = C->c[1] = null, C->x = 0;return C++;
}
#define LEN 20
void ins(trie *p, int x){
	for(int i=LEN-1; i>=0; i--){
		bool o = (x&(1<<i)) > 0;
		if(p->c[o]==null){
			p->c[o] = newtrie();
		}
		p = p->c[o];
		p->x ++;
	}
}
const int maxn = 100010;
trie *root = null;
long long ans = 0;
int a[maxn];
void get(int x, int k){
	trie *p = root;
	for(int i = LEN-1; i>=0; i--){
		bool o = (x>>i)&1, r = (k>>i)&1;
		if(r==0) p = p->c[o];
		if(r==1){
			ans += p->c[o]->x;
			p = p->c[!o];
		}
	}
}
void work(){
	C = null, C++;
	root = newtrie();
	ans = 0;
	int n, k;
	scanf("%d%d", &n, &k);
	for(int i=0; i<n; i++) scanf("%d", a+i+1);
	for(int i=0; i<n; i++) a[i+1] ^= a[i];
	for(int i=0; i<=n; i++){
		get(a[i], k);
		ins(root, a[i]);
	}
	cout<<ans<<endl;
}
int main(int argc, char const *argv[])
{
	null->c[0] = null->c[1] = null, null->x = 0;
	int T;
	scanf("%d", &T);
	rep(t,T) work();
	return 0;
}
